languages.text: "Низшие расы до отвращения примитивны". {n}Архонт кабала Черного Сердца обращается к Маражаю, игнорируя ваши слова.{/n} "Мон-кай даже не в состоянии решить судьбу своего врага, а ты надеялся, что кто-то здесь станет прислушиваться к {mf|его|ее} словам? Занятно. Арены Комморры пожрут тебя и твои игрушки".

traits.locale_text: "Низшие расы до отвращения примитивны". {n}Архонт кабала Черного Сердца обращается к Маражаю, игнорируя ваши слова.{/n} "Мон-кай даже не в состоянии решить судьбу своего врага, а ты надеялся, что кто-то здесь станет прислушиваться к {mf|его|ее} словам? Занятно. Арены Комморры пожрут тебя и твои игрушки".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."
languages.original_text: "Низшие расы до отвращения примитивны". {n}Архонт кабала Черного Сердца обращается к Маражаю, игнорируя ваши слова.{/n} "Мон-кай даже не в состоянии решить судьбу своего врага, а ты надеялся, что кто-то здесь станет прислушиваться к {mf|его|ее} словам? Занятно. Арены Комморры пожрут тебя и твои игрушки".

Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “这些劣等种族真是原始得令人厌恶。”{n}黑心阴谋团的执政官无视了你的话，对玛拉斋开了口。{/n}“这群猴子甚至没有办法决定它们敌人的命运，而你却以为，这里会有人愿意听信它的话？真是有趣，科摩罗的竞技场将会吞噬你和你的玩物。”
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: “这些劣等种族真是原始得令人厌恶。”{n}黑心阴谋团的执政官无视了你的话，对玛拉斋开了口。{/n}“这群猴子甚至没有办法决定它们敌人的命运，而你却以为，这里会有人愿意听信它的话？真是有趣，科摩罗的竞技场将会吞噬你和你的玩物。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「劣等種とは吐き気を催すほど原始的だな」{n}陰謀団〈コルズ・ヴレックス〉のアーコンがこちらの言葉を無視しながら、マラズハイに話しかける。{/n}「モン＝ケイは敵の運命すら決めることができないというのに、奴の言葉に耳を傾けてくれる者がここにいると期待していたのか？笑止。コモラフの闘技場に存在ごと飲みこまれてこい」
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: 「劣等種とは吐き気を催すほど原始的だな」{n}陰謀団〈コルズ・ヴレックス〉のアーコンがこちらの言葉を無視しながら、マラズハイに話しかける。{/n}「モン＝ケイは敵の運命すら決めることができないというのに、奴の言葉に耳を傾けてくれる者がここにいると期待していたのか？笑止。コモラフの闘技場に存在ごと飲みこまれてこい」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «Las razas inferiores son repugnantemente primitivas». {n}El Arconte de la Kábala del Corazón Negro se dirige a Marazhai, ignorando tus palabras.{/n} «{mf|El|La} mon-keigh no puede siquiera decidir el destino de su enemigo, ¿y tú esperabas que alguno de nosotros escuchara sus palabras? Magnífico. Las arenas de Commorragh os devorarán a ti y a tus juguetes».
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: «Las razas inferiores son repugnantemente primitivas». {n}El Arconte de la Kábala del Corazón Negro se dirige a Marazhai, ignorando tus palabras.{/n} «{mf|El|La} mon-keigh no puede siquiera decidir el destino de su enemigo, ¿y tú esperabas que alguno de nosotros escuchara sus palabras? Magnífico. Las arenas de Commorragh os devorarán a ti y a tus juguetes».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Les races inférieures sont si primitives, c'en est répugnant. » {n}Ignorant vos paroles, l'archonte de la Kabale du Cœur Noir se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « Vous espériez que quelqu'un ici écouterait {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh qui n'est même pas capable de décider du sort de son ennemi ? Amusant. Les arènes de Commorragh ne feront qu'une bouchée de vous et de vos petits jouets. »
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: « Les races inférieures sont si primitives, c'en est répugnant. » {n}Ignorant vos paroles, l'archonte de la Kabale du Cœur Noir se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « Vous espériez que quelqu'un ici écouterait {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh qui n'est même pas capable de décider du sort de son ennemi ? Amusant. Les arènes de Commorragh ne feront qu'une bouchée de vous et de vos petits jouets. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Die niederen Völker sind abstoßend primitiv." {n}Der Archon der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens ignoriert deine Worte und spricht Marazhai an.{/n} "{mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey kann nicht einmal über das Schicksal eines Feindes entscheiden, und Ihr hattet gehofft, jemand hier würde {mf|ihm|ihr} zuhören? Amüsant. Die Arenen werden Euch und Euer Spielzeug verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: "Die niederen Völker sind abstoßend primitiv." {n}Der Archon der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens ignoriert deine Worte und spricht Marazhai an.{/n} "{mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey kann nicht einmal über das Schicksal eines Feindes entscheiden, und Ihr hattet gehofft, jemand hier würde {mf|ihm|ihr} zuhören? Amüsant. Die Arenen werden Euch und Euer Spielzeug verschlingen."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Aşağı ırklar gerçekten de mide bulandıracak ilkellikte." {n}Kara Yürek Kabalı Arkonu, söylediklerini duymazdan gelerek Marazhai'a hitap ediyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh, düşmanına ne olacağına bile karar veremiyor. Sense buradakilerin onun sözlerine kulak vermesini umuyordun, öyle mi? Komik. Commorragh arenaları seni de oyuncaklarını da tüketecek."
languages.original_text: "The lesser races are disgustingly primitive." {n}The Archon of the Kabal of the Black Heart addresses Marazhai, ignoring your words.{/n} "The mon-keigh cannot even decide the fate of its enemy, and you were hoping that someone here would lend an ear to its words? Amusing. The arenas of Commorragh will devour you and your playthings."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağı ırklar gerçekten de mide bulandırıcı derecede ilkel." {n}Siyah Yürek Kabalı'nın Arkon'u, söylediklerini duymazdan gelerek Marazhai'a hitap ediyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh düşmanına ne olacağına bile karar veremiyor ve sen buradakilerin onun sözlerine kulak vermesini umuyordun, öyle mi? Komik. Commorragh arenaları seni de, oyuncaklarını da tüketecek."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
